actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provision added by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 which treats investments by individual retirement plans in collectibles as distributions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the provision which treats investments by individual retirement accounts and other retirement plans in collectibles as distributions equal to the cost of the collectible. Defines "collectibles" as items such as artworks, antiques, gems and coins.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision added by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 which treats investments by individual retirement plans in collectibles as distributions.
